channel.title: Need some help please!
channel.description:
well recently ive gotten a lot of pop ups, i know for a fact that it isnt the websites, i got to different ones and they are all the same even runescape and microsoft homepages. i did a full system scan with avira antivir, nothing, my ad-watch doesnt block shit and when i try to do a full system scan with it, the only thng that happens is it gets stuck. does any1 have any solutions to this? i really want the porn pop ups to stop
also i constanly lose connention, i never lost it when i had wireless only when my isp is down

item.description:

the fu superior:

i guess that is better than IE ,i do have it, its just im too used to useing IE, the point is, even if firefox stops pop ups they stll come and mess me up

Heh, firefox has a ie add on, it makes it look like it, I’ll post a link.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 08:30:02 PM[/size][hr]https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/4129

Look at pics, it’ll be fine.

item.title: Need some help please!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

You should download AVG Free Edition, and virus scan your computer with it. After that if it doesn’t find anything, use the online virus scanner linked below.

Links:
-AVG Free Edition direct download
-Trend Micro’s House Call

After that, and you still don’t find anything ask for help.

Read full topic
